Class EnemyShipShooter

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • EnemyShip
        • EnemyShipShooter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnyGroup, GroupB

    public class EnemyShipShooter
extends EnemyShip
    A class representing the Shooter enemies. every shooter enemy shoots a bullet after a certain amount of time. The class has a frameCounter that is incremented after every game frame to indicate if the shooter has to shoot.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mossad Helali
